title: How do I create a new GCash account
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How do I create a new GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005866623-How-do-I-create-a-new-GCash-account)
- [Create a GCash Jr account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/6026722650649-Create-a-GCash-Jr-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

You can easily download the GCash app and create a GCash account within minutes! GCash is now available for the following:

- [GCash for Filipinos and Foreign Nationals based in the Philippines aged 18+ with a PH SIM](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005866623)
- [GCash Jr for Filipinos or Foreign Nationals aged 7-17 with a PH SIM](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/6026722650649-Create-a-GCash-Jr-account)
- [GCash Overseas for Filipinos based abroad with an International SIM](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/28752622792089-Register-to-GCash-Overseas)

Note:

GCash is not yet available for Foreign Nationals with an International SIM.

### **How to create a GCash account**

First, please make sure you are using **a registered Philippine network SIM card**(Globe, TM, Talk N Text, Smart, SUN, or DITO).

Follow these steps to create your GCash account:

1. Search GCash in the [Google Play Store](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.globe.gcash.android&hl=en&gl=US&pli=1) or [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/ph/app/gcash/id520020791) and download it for FREE
2. Open the GCash app and input your mobile number. Tap **Next**
3. Enter the 6-digit authentication code sent to your mobile number. Tap **Submit**
4. Select **New Account**, fill in and review all required personal details, then  tap **Next** \> **Confirm.**

**Note**: Your personal information should be accurate and up-to-date, as using someone else's information is punishable by law.
5. Set your 4-digit MPIN and tap **Confirm**
6. Tap **Go to Login** to start using GCash

### Need more Help?

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [I can’t create or register for a GCash account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30445523277337)
- [There is another GCash account using my number. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30445589228057)
- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786)
- [My GCash account is still not verified after 3 days. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30299089512601)
